DOC.detailed_description: Over past two decade , success rate assist reproductive technology ( ART ) dramatically increase . This increase attribute improvement embryo culture , laboratory condition , optimization ovarian stimulation protocol . Over past year , interest alter ovarian stimulation protocol improve outcome . For example , recently group find modification ovulation trigger toward physiologic process improve oocyte quality pregnancy outcome . Others suggest minimal stimulation improve vitro fertilization ( IVF ) outcomes . The investigator propose investigate modifying ovarian stimulation woman `` decrease '' ovarian reserve . The investigator propose delayed start ovarian stimulation improve oocyte maturation quality pregnancy outcome . No published study date evaluate delayed start ovarian stimulation improve pregnancy outcome . However , investigator hypothesize use antagonist delayed start stimulation work one two mechanism : I . The partial suppression FSH allow recruitment early antral follicle . II . The partial suppression FSH allow FSH responsiveness exist follicle synchronize primary cohort , thereby increase total number follicle .
DOC.criteria: Antral Follicle Count ( AFC ) less equal 4 measure transvaginal ultrasound ( TVUS ) , Cancellation prior IVF cycle due poor ovarian response . Patients receive antagonist stimulation protocol IVF , IVF Intracytoplasmic Sperm Injection ( ICSI ) . Severe male factor infertility require surgical intervention obtain sperm Major uterine abnormality , Preimplantation genetic diagnostic ( PGD ) testing , Planned cycle without embryo transfer ( example , freezeall , donor , surrogate cycle ) .
